plugin.name: MeekroDB Plugin
plugin.author: Dan Hoover
plugin.description: This is the MeekroDB plugin for UserSpice. An advanced database class for your UserSpice project. Free for personal use. Purchase a 1 time or bulk commercial license at https://meekro.com/. Please note that this is version 2.3 of Meekro. I will not be updating to the latest version. If you need the latest version, you will need to download and modify the class.
